copywriter.

Andreia never liked to write in the third person.


That being said, there is so much more I can say about me, but let's talk about the words - the thing that matters here. I like words, always have, but it was not until late that I realized I could have gone straight for it. I got into medicine first. I studied and practised veterinary medicine for the love of animals, but the love for words eventually spoke louder. In between came the pharma industry. That's where I met the copywriters and thought: hey, I like that.

Now I do what makes me happy, and the best part?
My dog never needs to go to the doctor.

But enough about me, tell me about yourself.
hello@andreia.lu
